citeinfo.title: 2009 Wild and Scenic River Aerial Oblique CIR Photo Index

descript.abstract: Index to high quality Color Infrared oblique aerial imagery of Minnesota wild and scenic river system. Leaf off, snow off conditions. Feature class contains hyperlink to photos taken in spring of 2009.
descript.purpose: Associated photos are for monitoring and assessment of DNR lands and land interests along Minnesota's Wild and Scenic River System. For public information purposes. For ecological and hydrological analysis. For analysis of overall conditions of Wild and Scenic River System.
descript.supplinf: Kettle River, Rum River, Mississippi River, North Fork Crow River, Minnesota River, St. Croix River, Cannon River

timeperd.current: Wild and Scenic River Landuse Corridor ground condition.

theme.themekey: Scenic Easement, Wild and Scenic River, Imagery, Scenic Easement, Water Trail, Watershed

place.placekey: Kettle, Rum, Mississippi, North Fork Crow, Mississippi, St. Croix, Cannon, Minnesota

attracc.attraccr: Attributes have been checked for quality .

dataqual.complete: Some imagery has improper exposure but all is visible. All imagery contains WSR Landuse Corridors, though may miss some of the river.

horizpa.horizpar: GPS Location point file for imagery accuracy extimate 3-5 meters .

vertacc.vertaccr: Vertical positioning varies between 1000 and 2000 feet above ground level.

procstep.procdesc: This feature class (base_2009_wsr_oblique_cir_index.gdb\wild_and_scenic_river_aerial_oblique_cir_photo_index_2009) is derived from the original shapefile, idx_wsrcirpt3.shp, created in 2009.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table. Field names refer to the actual names of fields in the table; displayed field names (aliases) are defined in the field definition where applicable.

attr.attrdef: Field alias: Image ID. Unique identifier for image.
Field alias: Name of Wild and Scenic River. Name of Wild and Scenic River associated with image.
Field alias: Image Date. Season and year that photographic image was taken.
Field alias: Image Spectrum. Spectrum of photographic image (color infrared).
Field alias: Hyperlink. URL to jpg image.
Field alias: URL and Filename. URL to jpg image.
Field alias: Latitude. Latitude in decimal degrees.
Field alias: Longitude. Longitude in decimal degrees.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team
